main.*:
'''Mrs Tedlock''' is a colleague at [[Chandler's office]] who is seen when [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] is in his cubicle prior to him quitting ("[[The One With The Stoned Guy]]").   She is played by [[Fritzi Burr]].
